      • autoLoadModules

        public StandaloneClientBuilder autoLoadModules​()
        If this option is set, Bt will use the service loading mechanism to load any modules that are available on application's classpath. To support auto-loading a module should expose BtModuleProvider provider. Auto-loaded modules will be used in default configuration.
        Since:
        1.1
